entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kugaaruk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -38.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kugaaruk Airport 04:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -38.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -48
Dewpoint: -42.5°C
Wind: WSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Partly cloudy. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Ice fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 23 by morning. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind south 30 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 03:00 AM MST Tuesday 17 January 2023
